body_html: @varghesealex90 the problem is that you are summing across channels from the beginning, so I am not sure if that is right (nor sure if it's not). But it should work without modification. Did you print the size of num before num=torch.sum(num,dim=3)#####b,c?
body_text: @varghesealex90 the problem is that you are summing across channels from the beginning, so I am not sure if that is right (nor sure if it's not). But it should work without modification. Did you print the size of num before num=torch.sum(num,dim=3)#####b,c?
body: @varghesealex90 the problem is that you are summing across channels from the beginning, so I am not sure if that is right (nor sure if it's not). But it should work without modification. Did you print the size of _num_ before `num=torch.sum(num,dim=3)#####b,c`?
